channel.title: Custom spell's :P
channel.description:
So, how do i create my own graphics for the teles and ancients and stuff
firstly im guessing i draw what it should look like? then how would i add it in as a tele or spell graphic[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 17, 2008, 01:11:55 pm[/size][hr]hi

item.title: Custom spell's :P
item.dc:creator: @mclovinscape mclovinscape
item.description:
@mclovinscape wrote:

Umm you would need a client, and alot of other Things… But recoloring is easy but making new items you would need metasequio and a model converter…and thats not so easy… about making new gfx’s i have no clue
